32.eng-name: Virtues of the Night of Qadr

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to practice I`tikaf in the last ten nights of Ramadan and used to say, "Look for the Night of Qadr in the last ten nights of the month of Ramadan

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحَرِّي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ فِي الْوِتْرِ مِنَ الْعَشْرِ الأَوَاخِرِ
chapter.eng-name: To search for the night of Qadr in the odd nights
